alert.note: Alert for Armstrong; Indiana; Jefferson (Pennsylvania) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 07 at 4:38PM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT NORTHEASTERN INDIANA...JEFFERSON AND NORTHEASTERN ARMSTRONG COUNTIES THROUGH 530 PM EST... At 438 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Portland Mills to near New Bethlehem. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Punxsutawney, Brookville, Reynoldsville, Brockway, Sykesville, Falls Creek, Big Run, Rossiter, Glen Campbell, Timblin, Worthville, and Anita. This includes Interstate 80 in Pennsylvania between mile markers 80 and 96. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
